== Mandur (626720) ==

Mandur is a village in the [[Tiswadi]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 205.22 hectares and harbouring 726 households with total population of 3113 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 17 km. Male population is 1494 and female population is 1619. Scheduled Caste Population is 9 and Scheduled Tribes population is 310. Census Location Code of the village is 626720<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate male population: 1300 (87.01%)
* Literate female population: 1254 (77.46%)
